name: Figma FIIT
description:
V1.2 Updated with Instructions!


Figma Intellectually Intensive Training, from a skill to grow to totally pro in 15 minutes.


Pair this with https://www.ideocolab.com/colaboration/ for a quick Figma 101 Exercise. This covers standard working tips for contributors who are working on files that might already be made on teams or editing content for slides or other in-editor content rather than doing hardcore prototyping.
